description: Build generative AI applications with foundation models

actions.name: custom_api_call
actions.description: Make a custom API call to any AWS Bedrock endpoint. Requests are automatically signed with AWS Signature V4.

actions.name: generate_content_from_image
actions.description: Ask a Bedrock model a question about an image.

actions.name: generate_embeddings
actions.description: Generate vector embeddings from text using Amazon Titan Embed, Cohere Embed, or Amazon Nova Multimodal Embeddings models.

actions.name: generate_image
actions.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using Amazon Titan Image Generator or Stability AI models.

actions.name: send_prompt
actions.description: Send a text prompt to an Amazon Bedrock model.
